DamageImmunities: Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Probability Manipulation
Traits.Content: The Time Traveling Hipster has a knack for staying unnoticed, granting them advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks. Additionally, they can reroll one failed saving throw per long rest.

Traits.Name: Evasive Maneuvers
Traits.Content: The Time Traveling Hipster can use their reaction to impose disadvantage on attack rolls against them if they can see the attacker.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: The Time Traveling Hipster is a 6th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). They can innately cast the following spells: At will: minor illusion, dancing lights. 1/day each: dimension door, invisibility, mirror image.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Time Traveling Hipster makes two attacks: one with Temporal Displacement and one with Probability Burst.

Actions.Name: Temporal Displacement
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be unable to take reactions until the start of the Time Traveling Hipster's next turn.

Actions.Name: Probability Burst
Actions.Content: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) force damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be pushed back 10 feet and knocked prone.

Actions.Name: Temporal Distortion (Recharge 6)
Actions.Content: A 15-foot-radius effect extends out from the Time Traveling Hipster. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or become disoriented. While affected, a target takes 5 (1d10) thunder damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Actions.Name: Retroactive Humor (1/Day)
Actions.Content: The Time Traveling Hipster performs a quirky movement, causing laughter. Each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become incapacitated until the end of the Time Traveling Hipster's next turn as they are overwhelmed by confusion.
